xxl.core.spatial.rectangles

Interface Rectangle

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Comparable, Convertable, Descriptor, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoublePointRectangle, FixedPointRectangle, FloatPointRectangle, MinSkewHist.Bucket, SpatialHistogramBucket

    public interface Rectangle
extends Comparable, Convertable, Descriptor
    A high-dimensional Rectangle (=hyper-cube).
    See Also:
    Point, RandomRectangle, DoublePointRectangle, FloatPointRectangle, FixedPointRectangle

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double area()
      Calculates the area (volume) of this rectangle as a double-point value.
      boolean contains(Point point)
      Checks whether the rectangle contains the given point
      double[] deltas()
      Returns the delta (vector containing size on each dimention) of this rectangle as an array of double-point values
      int dimensions()
      Returns the dimensionality of this rectangle.
      double distance(Rectangle rectangle, int p)
      Computes the shortest distance between this rectangle and another given rectangle using the Lp-Metric.
      Point getCorner(boolean right)
      Returns the left/right corner point of this rectangle.
      void intersect(Rectangle rectangle)
      Computes the intersection of this rectangle and another given rectangle and stores the result instead of source rectangle.
      double margin()
      Calculates the margin (perimeter) of this rectangle as a double-point value.
      double maxDistance(Point point, int p)
      Computes the distance between the given point and the most distant point of this rectangle using the specified Lp-Metric.
      double minDistance(Point point, int p)
      Computes the distance between the given point and the nearest point of this rectangle using the specified Lp-Metrics.
      double overlap(Rectangle rectangle)
      Computes the area of overlap between this rectangle and another given one.
      boolean overlaps(Rectangle rectangle, int dimension)
      Checks whether this rectangle overlaps another given rectangle at a given dimension.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo

      • Methods inherited from interface xxl.core.io.Convertable

        read, write

      • Methods inherited from interface xxl.core.indexStructures.Descriptor

        clone, contains, equals, overlaps, union

    • Method Detail

      • getCorner

        Point getCorner(boolean right)
        Returns the left/right corner point of this rectangle.
        Parameters:
        right - if this parameter is set to true upper-right corner will be returned otherwise it will be lower-left corner
        Returns:
        returns corner point of this rectangle (upper-right or lower-left depending on the input boolean parameter right)

      • dimensions

        int dimensions()
        Returns the dimensionality of this rectangle.
        Returns:
        dimensionality of the rectangle

      • deltas

        double[] deltas()
        Returns the delta (vector containing size on each dimention) of this rectangle as an array of double-point values
        Returns:
        returns the delta of this rectangle as an array of double-point values

      • area

        double area()
        Calculates the area (volume) of this rectangle as a double-point value.
        Returns:
        returns the area of this rectangle

      • margin

        double margin()
        Calculates the margin (perimeter) of this rectangle as a double-point value.
        Returns:
        returns the margin of this rectangle

      • contains

        boolean contains(Point point)
        Checks whether the rectangle contains the given point
        Parameters:
        point - is the point to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if this rectangle contains given double point

      • distance

        double distance(Rectangle rectangle,
                int p)
        Computes the shortest distance between this rectangle and another given rectangle using the Lp-Metric.
        Parameters:
        rectangle - the given rectangle to be checked
        p - the given metric to be used
        Returns:
        distance calculated using given Lp-Metrics

      • minDistance

        double minDistance(Point point,
                   int p)
        Computes the distance between the given point and the nearest point of this rectangle using the specified Lp-Metrics.
        Parameters:
        point - the given point to be checked
        p - the given metric to be used
        Returns:
        distance calculated using given Lp-Metrics

      • maxDistance

        double maxDistance(Point point,
                   int p)
        Computes the distance between the given point and the most distant point of this rectangle using the specified Lp-Metric.
        Parameters:
        point - the given point to be checked
        p - the given metric to be used
        Returns:
        distance calculated using given Lp-Metrics

      • overlaps

        boolean overlaps(Rectangle rectangle,
                 int dimension)
        Checks whether this rectangle overlaps another given rectangle at a given dimension.
        Parameters:
        rectangle - the rectangle to be tested.
        dimension - specifies in which dimension to test.
        Returns:
        true if this rectangle overlaps another rectangle at a given dimension.

      • overlap

        double overlap(Rectangle rectangle)
        Computes the area of overlap between this rectangle and another given one.
        Parameters:
        rectangle - is the rectangle to calculate area of overlap with
        Returns:
        returns the calculated overlap area or 0 if the rectangles do not overlap

      • intersect

        void intersect(Rectangle rectangle)
        Computes the intersection of this rectangle and another given rectangle and stores the result instead of source rectangle. Attention! Source rectangle is modified. There will be a exception IllegalArgumentException if they do not overlap
        Parameters:
        rectangle -
